title: Body Frame Size Calculator
metaDescription: Free body frame size calculator - Determine if you have a small, medium, or large body frame using wrist circumference or elbow breadth.

form.title: Enter your information
form.methodHelp: Choose a method based on which measurement you can take most easily
form.wristHelp: Measure the circumference of your wrist just above the prominent wrist bone
form.elbowHelp: Extend your arm forward with palm up. Bend elbow to 90Â°. Measure the distance between the two prominent elbow bones
